name: Bing Search
special_instructions: One of Bing search queries or Bing search URLs must be provided, if it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
Bing default market code is 'en-US', so if you want to search in US simply don't input any market code
If you want to remove results that are not CSV friendly, set 'csvFriendliness' to true

The maximum number of search results pages the crawler will load in parallel can be set using 'maxConcurrency'. A higher number means you will get your results faster, but also it will burn through your available proxies quicker
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
